review: I visited Mood Indian Restaurant and was thoroughly impressed. The food was delicious, with standout dishes like the chicken tikka masala and garlic naan. The staff was friendly and attentive, making the dining experience enjoyable. The restaurant has a clean and welcoming atmosphere, which added to the overall vibe. While the prices were a bit higher than expected, the quality and portion sizes justified the cost. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a great Indian dining experience.
